properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10 v11 v12

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Ye Hielands and ye lowlands, Oh, where hae ye been? They have slain the Earl of Moray,

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: And they laid him on the green They have slain the Earl of Moray, And they laid him on the green.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: Now woe be to thee, Huntley! And wherefore did you say? I bade you bring him wi' you,

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: But forbade you him to slay. I bade you bring him wi' you, But forbade you him to slay.

verse.name: v5
v6
verse.lines: Oh, he might have been a king. And the bonny Earl of Moray, Oh, he might have been a king.

verse.name: v7
v8
verse.lines: Was the flower among them a'. And the bonny Earl of Moray Was the flower among them a'.

verse.name: v9
v10
verse.lines: Oh, he was the Queen's love. And the bonny Earl of Moray, Oh, he was the Queen's love.

verse.name: v11
verse.lines: Oh! Long will his lady Look o'er the castle down Ere she see the Earl of Moray

verse.name: v12
verse.lines: Come sounding through the town. Ere she see the Earl of Moray Come sounding through the town.
